org.eclipse.gef.cloudio.internal.ui.Word

Packages that use Word
Package
Description
org.eclipse.gef.cloudio.internal.ui
This package provides a Canvas dedicated to visualizing word clouds (TagCloud), as well as a related ContentViewer ( TagCloudViewer).
